primary_question: 23. (a) In the given figure, the shape of the top of a table is that of a sector of a circle with centre O and $\angle AOB = 90^\circ$. If AO = OB = 42 cm, then find the perimeter of the top of the table.
secondary_question: (b) In the given figure, three sectors of a circle of radius 5 cm, making angles 35°, 50° and 95° at the centre are shaded. Find the area of the shaded region. [Use $\pi = 22/7$]
